description: Detects when an attacker adds a new "Debugger" value to the "DbgManagedDebugger" key in order to achieve persistence which will get invoked when an application crashes
false_positives: Legitimate use of the key to setup a debugger. Which is often the case on developers machines
name: Add Debugger Entry To DbgManagedDebugger For Persistence
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\.NETFramework\\DbgManagedDebugger) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:"\"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\vsjitdebugger.exe\"\ PID\ %d\ APPDOM\ %d\ EXTEXT\ \"%s\"\ EVTHDL\ %d")))
author: frack113
